statements: SELECT * FROM device_management;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM device_management WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_location FROM device_management ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM device_management WHERE device_type = 'Printer';
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_checkin FROM device_management WHERE device_status = FALSE;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, device_location, device_status, last_checkin FROM device_management;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device_management WHERE device_status = true;
SELECT device_type, device_location, device_name FROM device_management ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_management WHERE device_status = true AND device_location LIKE '%Office%' ORDER BY last_checkin DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, device_location FROM device_management WHERE device_status = false ORDER BY device_location, device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE operational_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, last_checked_in FROM devices ORDER BY last_checked_in DESC;
SELECT command_type, command_status, created_at FROM commands WHERE command_status != 'completed';
SELECT device_name, device_type, operational_status FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Printer%';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE operational_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT devices.device_id, devices.device_name, commands.command_type, commands.command_status FROM devices JOIN commands ON devices.device_id = commands.device_id;
SELECT device_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM last_checked_in) AS last_checked_day FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Server' ORDER BY last_checked_day DESC;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_commands FROM devices JOIN commands ON devices.device_id = commands.device_id GROUP BY device_name HAVING total_commands > 5;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM device_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT command_id, command_name, command_status FROM device_commands WHERE command_status = 'pending';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location, status FROM devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'device%';
SELECT d.device_name, dc.command_name FROM devices d JOIN device_commands dc ON d.device_id = dc.device_id WHERE dc.command_status = 'pending';
SELECT dl.log_id, dl.device_id, dl.log_timestamp, d.device_name FROM device_logs dl JOIN devices d ON dl.device_id = d.device_id;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, device_location FROM remote_devices;
SELECT * FROM device_status WHERE status_code = 200;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM device_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_commands WHERE command_type = 'reboot' ORDER BY command_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM remote_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM remote_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, status_code, last_updated FROM device_status WHERE status_id > 10 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING log_count > 5;
SELECT d.device_name, c.command_type FROM remote_devices d INNER JOIN device_commands c ON d.device_id = c.device_id WHERE c.command_type = 'RESET';
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM devices WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT log_id, device_id, log_timestamp FROM device_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT device_name, status FROM devices WHERE location = 'Living Room' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY email ASC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;

SELECT d.device_name, dl.log_timestamp, c.command_description FROM devices d JOIN device_logs dl ON d.device_id = dl.device_id JOIN commands c ON d.device_id = c.command_id WHERE dl.log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
